content: Please provide only the domain name, avoiding URL paths or extra characters.

comment.text: The "CSPUrlHelp" translation key is used to display a message instructing users to provide only their domain name when entering a Content Security Policy (CSP) URL. This message appears in a UI component where users can input or select CSP URLs, aiming to guide them towards accurate and complete input.

usage.context:
</Container>
 <Text
 lineHeight="20px"
 color={error ? theme?.input.focusErrorBorderColor : globalColors.gray}
 >
 {error || t("CSPUrlHelp", { productName: t("Common:ProductName") })}
 </Text>
 <ChipsContainer>{getChips(cspDomains)}</ChipsContainer>
 </>
 );
 };
